content:
the Michigan Daily

One hundred and thirtythree years of editorial freedom

Jan PERIOD  

The School of Business Administration created a new fasttrack program for women to prepare them to enter the business world quicker PERIOD

The program consisted of two semesters of classes in areas including merchandising accounting and banking PERIOD

At the end of the two semesters students would be prepared to take a job in a business office PERIOD

In addition if they stayed on another two semesters they would receive a bachelors degree in business administration PERIOD

Jan PERIOD  

The University announced that a new mens residence hall would be built across the street from the Law Club PERIOD

The residence hall later known as South Quad would be eight floors high and cost  PERIOD It would be completed in September  and house  men PERIOD

Jan  

The Ann Arbor City Council unanimously passed an ordinance regarding the use of fake identification PERIOD

The new penalties for being caught with a fake ID would now involve fines and possible community service PERIOD

Jan PERIOD  

Former University employee Arthur Arroyo was sentenced to five to  years in prison after being found guilty of setting fire to the Economics Building on Christmas Eve  PERIOD

Jan PERIOD  

A fire partially gutted the Sigma Phi Epsilon fraternity house at  State St PERIOD

The blaze started at around  a.m PERIOD Fire inspectors believed it had been ignited because of a defective chimney located near a furnace PERIOD

Two brothers were sleeping in the house at the time but quickly evacuated once awakened by firefighters PERIOD

Jan PERIOD  

In a vote of  to five with one abstention Student Government Council established a committee to study progress for removing fraternity and sorority entrance restrictions PERIOD

Jan PERIOD  

The University announced that up to . million taken from the student fees account would be used to help build a campus theatre PERIOD

This act broke the tradition of using student funds solely for student purposes PERIOD

Jan PERIOD  

ROTC commanding officers at the University requested help from the administration to boost their low membership PERIOD

They said a restoration of LSA credit to ROTC classes that was eliminated in  would greatly help the ROTC program PERIOD

Jan PERIOD
